message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly a game-changer and I believe it can significantly benefit your business. Considering its value, I propose a price of $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and would be a fair compromise.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. I am willing to meet you halfway at $9500 for the product. This allows us to find a balance between what you're comfortable spending and the value I place on the product. I hope this proposal works for you.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $8800 for the product? I think this price is a fair compromise and would allow us to come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After considering your offer, I am willing to lower the price to $8900. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our positions. I hope we can reach an agreement that benefits us both.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $8500 for the product? I think this price is a fair compromise and would allow us to come to an agreement.

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to agree on a price of $8600 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests. I hope this offer will lead to a successful transaction.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $8200 for the product? I think this price is a fair compromise and would allow us to come to an agreement.

I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Bob. After further consideration, I am willing to agree on a price of $8300 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable compromise that respects both our positions. I hope this offer will lead to a successful transaction.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Unfortunately, I've reached my limit and I'm unable to go any higher. I think we've reached a stalemate. I'll have to reconsider buying the product from John for $12000.
